About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project is in safe hands

I have a background in SEO analysis and have recently transitioned into the world of web development through self-learning. My focus is on Full Stack Development, and I have successfully acquired proficiency in a wide array of technologies including C, JavaScript, Git, GitHub, Bootstrap, Tailwind, React, MongoDB, Node.js, and Express.js.
